column4:
Great news that the @federalreserve is lowering the minimum loan amount to participate in the MSLP. 

We are still in the throes of the pandemic and it’s essential that the Fed continue to ensure its programs meet the needs of struggling businesses as we weather the pandemic. https://t.co/7sLofshwhx

Thanks to the CARES Act, Oklahoma's hospitals & small businesses have been given much needed support during the coronavirus pandemic. 

In @GuthrieOK alone, more than 1,500 jobs were saved thanks to the PPP.

READ MORE via @GuthrieLeader ↓
https://t.co/HSPJSKpMSb

Grateful to be named a Guardian of Small Business by @NFIB!

Small, family-owned businesses are the engines to local economies throughout Oklahoma, and in the wake of COVID-19, it’s critically important that we support our local business owners to keep our communities thriving. https://t.co/m3Tw7KrEYh

Last week, I led bipartisan efforts to safeguard the Provider Relief Fund and ensure our rural hospitals have the resources they need in order to continue to care for our communities. 

Thank you, @HHSGov
for listening to stakeholders on this issue.

MORE: https://t.co/etzlzOLoix

Rural communities rely on access to infrastructure to remain healthy & prosperous- including electricity!

Thank you @SecretarySonny & @USDA for the $76M @RD_Oklahoma investment benefitting rural Oklahoma families & businesses. When rural America thrives, all of America thrives. https://t.co/5St6MPUt5c

OK-03 is home to many small business owners who have embodied the entrepreneurial spirit & stepped up to fight COVID-19.

Yesterday, I visited @PWSpirits to check out how they shifted operations to produce hand sanitizer & to thank them for looking out for our fellow Oklahomans. https://t.co/34SGonOBFm

As COVID-19 spread throughout the U.S., one thing became clear from our public health officials: Americans needed to increase the practice of good hygiene.

Distilleries quickly joined the fight and began making hand sanitizer- including @PWSpirits.
https://t.co/FORrgFb4HW.

During the COVID-19 pandemic, many of our fellow Oklahomans have fallen on hard times. Thankfully, organizations like @WeatherfordFRC have stepped in to help.

Today, I visited @WeatherfordFRC to learn about their operations during COVID-19 & to ask how Congress can further help. https://t.co/lxSP9GEbPb

I’m grateful for the care that Oklahoma’s medical providers have given to my fellow Oklahomans.

As we fight the spread of COVID-19, Congress and the Trump Admin. must continue to help our communities increase testing & expand telehealth services for our rural communities. https://t.co/ybj7DNS9fP

Last week, I visited @integrishealth- Canadian Valley Hospital to show my appreciation to Oklahoma’s frontline workers. 

Throughout the COVID-19 pandemic, Oklahoma’s doctors, nurses, and frontline workers have risen to the occasion, caring for their communities and neighbors. https://t.co/5oLhSu5xJ6

Oklahoma's cattle ranchers have been hit hard by COVID-19 & food supply chain disruptions. 

I'm proud to join @RepDustyJohnson, @HouseAgGOP Ranking Member @ConawayTX11, and others in introducing the PRICE Act- legislation providing solutions to ease the burdens felt by ranchers. https://t.co/BU2m95bSmR

Thanks to #OperationWarpSpeed, the U.S. is developing a safe, effective vaccine to defeat #COVID19.

An effective vaccine will protect Americans & help businesses reopen fully & safely.

Read more about current recovery efforts in @TheAltusTimes ↓
https://t.co/abWKIrtDcY

Last week, @POTUS @realDonaldTrump unveiled his America-First Healthcare Plan.

I applaud @POTUS @realDonaldTrump's healthcare plan protecting those with pre-existing conditions, ending surprise medical billing, and lowering prescription drug costs.
https://t.co/sgDdM4QQMR

The #PaycheckProtectionProgram has helped more than 66,000 Oklahoma small businesses.

Sadly, the PPP expired with $135 billion left unspent, leaving many small businesses without a lifeline to weather the pandemic's economic conditions.

It's time to act!
https://t.co/ceoJQvNQAl

RT @HouseGOP: The Trump Administration is leading an all-hands-on-deck mission to develop a safe COVID-19 vaccine.

A safe and effective va…

Oklahomans have until September 30th to fill out their census- visit https://t.co/oq1jdL4njv for more info!

I challenge @OklahomaAg Secretary @blaynearthur, @YukonDistrict Superintendent Dr. Jason Simeroth, @osururalhealth Director Corie Kaiser to join the #2020Census Challenge! https://t.co/UPASOlG8z7

Wheat growers are resilient, but many still face challenges due the pandemic. COVID-19 has weakened market positions across all commodities throughout the U.S.- especially wheat. 

Thank you @SecretarySonny for addressing the needs of Oklahoma's hard red winter wheat growers.

📻 TUNE IN: This morning at 8:00 a.m. CST, I'll be on @KRMGtulsa with @rcourikrmg talking COVID-19 relief legislation negotiations, election security, and my bill- the Rural STEM Education Act. 

Listen live ↓
https://t.co/CwxKgStO9f

Even though COVID-19 has disrupted air travel, the need to invest in Oklahoma’s rural airports remains. 

The Third District’s airports are a valuable component of our infrastructure and an important economic development tool. 

Thank you, @SecElaineChao!
https://t.co/XvFCYmK6IJ

Today, 25 of my House colleagues & I sent a bipartisan letter urging @USDA to expand CFAP eligibility to include all wheat varieties.

READ THE LETTER ↓
https://t.co/26QmmZ5qD1

Great news for Oklahoma's school kids!

Thank you @USDA for extending school nutrition waivers. The flexibility provided by @USDA will ensure Oklahoma's school children have access to nutritious food as our communities continue to respond to COVID-19.
https://t.co/e4d7UnpekV

Earlier this month, @POTUS took an important step to expand telehealth services for those living in rural communities. 

Thank you @realDonaldTrump for your efforts & @repkevinhern for taking the lead to support the permanent extension of these telehealth services.

LEARN MORE ↓

Rural hospitals are the backbone of our communities, yet sadly, too many are closing across the U.S. 

The RURAL HELP Act will help keep our rural hospitals open, ensuring those who call rural America home have access to health care. 

Learn more with @NEWS9's @AlexDCameron ↓ https://t.co/3hRQhEzegz

Rural hospitals are essential in Oklahoma. Sadly, more and more rural hospitals are closing throughout the U.S. 

Recently, I cosponsored @RepFredKeller's RURAL HELP Act to help keep Oklahoma's rural hospitals open!

READ MORE ↓
https://t.co/QVv0rA4I3o

for your investment in OK! https://t.co/TZBlN6AHVd

Well said, @SecretarySonny!

https://t.co/c9SvnZW7TG

https://t.co/MEIyiVDfeo

These @HRSAgov awards will help further strengthen prevention, treatment, and recovery services in rural America. https://t.co/2H15ZSOiBW

The #PaycheckProtectionProgram has saved more than 620,000 jobs and kept more than 64,000 businesses open in Oklahoma.

Whether you're having trouble paying your bills, looking for student loan borrower benefits, or looking for resources on how best to manage your finances, the @CFPB is committed to protecting consumers during the coronavirus.

https://t.co/vCyqhooyqo

Today, @FinancialCmte held a hearing with @CFPBDirector on the Bureau's work to protect consumers during the COVID-19 crisis.

While my colleagues across the aisle tried to discredit the Bureau, @FinancialCmte Republicans took a look at just how @CFPB is offering help. 

WATCH ↓ https://t.co/mbG8bdCtzR

Yesterday, I spoke to 
@OKCFOX's @DanSnyderFOX25 about the legislative priorities that must be in Congress' next COVID-19 relief package.

It's critical that Congress extend the Paycheck Protection Program and provide funds for @USDA's Commodity Credit Corporation. 

🎥: @OKCFOX https://t.co/Cu3qT92Qu6

U.S. adversaries, including the Chinese Communist Party and Russia, are spreading COVID-19 disinformation & hacking COVID-19 research, exploiting our communities across the country.

We mustn't let our adversaries threaten our health or national security.
https://t.co/xuW6iFvsEn

Proud to have @JerryMoran & @SenatorLankford
introduce the Senate companion to my bill- the RAMP-UP Act.

COVID-19 has shed light on the incredible importance of a strong food supply chain.

I applaud @GovStitt & @OklahomaAg @blaynearthur for providing the critical resources necessary for Oklahomans to help strengthen our nation's food supply chain.

https://t.co/2ZHf1GDVoA

China & Russia's theft continues to threaten our public health and national security.

We cannot allow American leadership in #STEM to be compromised in the wake of #COVID19.

.@USDA's Coronavirus Food Assistance Program is a first step, but Congress and the Administration must improve this package and deliver much needed additional support to our producers whose losses will far outstrip available assistance under CFAP.
